document_title: Rabies: Symptoms, causes, diagnosis and prevention
subsection_content: Rabies is an infectious disease caused by a rabies virus transmitted from mammals to humans, leading to serious brain and nerve infections and high mortality. 99% of rabies cases in humans are caused by domestic dogs infected with the rabies virus. (first)
subsection_data:
benh dai.json. What is rabies?
Rabies is an infectious disease caused by a rabies virus transmitted from mammals to humans, leading to serious brain and nerve infections and high mortality. 99% of rabies cases in humans are caused by domestic dogs infected with the rabies virus. (first)
